posts.title: Mp2.2 clarification
posts.body:
1. What is the end goal of mp2.2? Lol. The text in the instructions are weighted towards math speak and not everyday language, hard to decipher what I need to do. I understand we need to write InL2, particularly modifying only the "score_one" function within search_eval.py. Are we only **functionally** supposed to be concerned on achieving [this](https://doc-14-ac-docs.googleusercontent.com/docs/securesc/9vfrjgsp0bkardqadua9agapr5k1aiuk/cnf84a6uqu8ss25hghkvgr201efcqc3i/1631808975000/08564352397998940749/14543551473788757540/1gcbywLx0ZEU3eqxlDtLk6o4Yxd788IiK?e=view&authuser=0&nonce=7q2h7veaagrm6&user=14543551473788757540&hash=kdu2vqi11mloerbopp32njiftld9no9b) within the score_one function?

2. How do you start the script? Other students are suggesting:
 ```
python3 search_eval.py config.toml
```

However, when I run the above command, it just hangs at the first line forever. PFB: 


```
Building or loading index...
Query path!! cranfield-queries.txt
Running queries
0
what similarity laws must be obeyed when constructing aeroelastic models of heated high speed aircraft 

```
In the python code, I am noticing that there's an additional parameter that gets read in outside of config.toml 
called "CFG" what is the about and how does this fit into the picture of the assignment? 

```
if __name__ == '__main__':
    if len(sys.argv) != 2:
        print("Usage: {} config.toml".format(sys.argv[0]))
        sys.exit(1)

    cfg = sys.argv[1]
    print('Building or loading index...')
    idx = metapy.index.make_inverted_index(cfg)
    ranker = load_ranker(cfg)
    ev = metapy.index.IREval(cfg)
```
